teacheasy.runtime.editor

Class PropertiesPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.runtime.editor.PropertiesPane

  • public class PropertiesPane
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates functionality relating to the properties pane of the editor. Displays values related to the selected page and allows their modification. Contains classes to encapsulate editor functionality for specific object types.
    Version:
    1.0 Apr 21 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

        nPane - The UI node for the pane. Type VBox.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Page nSelectedPage,
          PageObject nSelectedObject)
        Updates the properties pane with changes to the selection.
        Parameters:
        nSelectedPage - The currently selected page. Can be null if no lesson is open.
        nSelectedObject - The currently selected object on the page. Can be null if no object is selected.
